title: How to Make a Papaya, Strawberry, and Banana Smoothie

steps.headline: Chop the strawberries.
steps.description: Take off the green leaves and chop the strawberries each in half. Put them into a 1 cup measuring cup and save it.

steps.headline: Slice the bananas and papayas.
steps.description: Do the same with the measuring cup as the strawberries.

steps.headline: Get a blender and pour all ingredients inside blender.
steps.description: Make sure it is clean and you wash before use.

steps.headline: Blend all ingredients until completely liquid.
steps.description: It should be thick, so blend for at least 30 seconds.

steps.headline: Pour into cups and add anything you want in it, such as extra fruit.
steps.description: Add 1/2 tablespoon of sugar or honey if it's not sweet enough.

text: Chop the strawberries. Take off the green leaves and chop the strawberries each in half. Put them into a 1 cup measuring cup and save it. Slice the bananas and papayas. Do the same with the measuring cup as the strawberries. Get a blender and pour all ingredients inside blender. Make sure it is clean and you wash before use. Blend all ingredients until completely liquid. It should be thick, so blend for at least 30 seconds. Pour into cups and add anything you want in it, such as extra fruit. Add 1/2 tablespoon of sugar or honey if it's not sweet enough. Serve and enjoy.
